meta.name: Baylen Out Loud
meta.description: Baylen Out Loud Baylen Dupree, a vibrant and resilient 22-year-old with Tourette Syndrome. Every day, Baylen faces a variety of extreme and uncontrollable vocal and motor tics while navigating the challenges of becoming an independent adult. Supported by her loving family in West Virginia, including her five siblings, devoted boyfriend, Colin, protective father, Allen, and strong and independent mother, Julie, Baylen learns to manage the complexities of Tourette and embrace life fully.

videos.title: Your Anxiety Is Giving Me Anxiety
videos.overview: he Duprees are off to London for a potential life-changing experience as Baylen will get to try a device that could reduce her tics. However, Baylen's difficulty navigating the airport and Colin's severe flight anxiety threatens the journey.

videos.title: Your Anxiety Is Giving Me Anxiety
videos.overview: he Duprees are off to London for a potential life-changing experience as Baylen will get to try a device that could reduce her tics. However, Baylen's difficulty navigating the airport and Colin's severe flight anxiety threatens the journey.

videos.title: Your Anxiety Is Giving Me Anxiety
Get Me Out of Here!
videos.overview: Baylen grows curious about a device for her tics but would need to leave the country to try it; a trip to the library is anything but uneventful for Baylen; Colin takes the first step in his new career and learns just how hard it can be to succeed.

Your Anxiety Is Giving Me Anxiety
I Have Tourette's Stupid!
videos.overview: Baylen Dupree is a young adult living with Tourette Syndrome and it impacts every aspect of her life and the lives of her parents and five siblings. Ready to be an independent adult, Baylen tries to navigate a world full of triggers and danger.

videos.title: The Airport Is a Tic Disaster
videos.overview: Baylen learns what Colin's work relocation could mean for their relationship. Baylen is invited to be a guest panelist at a Tourette's Convention in Dallas but airports and flying can be a recipe for disaster.

videos.title: We All Have Tourette's
videos.overview: Baylen travels to Texas for a Tourette convention, but her tics threaten to overpower her big moment. After connecting with new friends and a doctor who suggests a radical treatment, it all proves too much for Baylen when she suffers a severe tic attack.

videos.title: Going for Narnia!
videos.overview: After suffering a terrifying tic attack, questions are raised about Baylen's ability to live on her own. Baylen and Colin decide to take a big step in their relationship, but the excitement is short-lived as they begin sharing the news with family.

videos.title: It Was Him, Chainsaws, Me
videos.overview: Baylen and Colin are excited to make the next move in their relationship, but they need approval from Colin's very conservative parents first. Allen talks man to man with Colin. Baylen tries Botox to help with her tics. Colin drops a life changing bomb.

videos.title: I Have News
videos.overview: At Baylen's birthday party, tension is in the air as Colin's birthday surprise royally backfires, leaving Baylen wondering if they're on the same page.

videos.title: What if My Dad Says No?
videos.overview: After a huge fight at Baylen's birthday party, Colin works on rebuilding trust; Allen and Julie worry Baylen's tics are getting worse and wonder if Deep Brain Stimulation could work; Colin breaks the news to Julie and Allen about his true intentions.

videos.title: You Don't Have To Stare Into My Soul
videos.overview: Colin seeks Baylen's parents' blessing to propose to her. Baylen and her parents meet with a neurologist to discuss Deep Brain Stimulation.

videos.title: This Is a Big Plot Twist
videos.overview: The Duprees head to the beach for their annual family vacation where Colin secretly plans to propose, but a brewing thunderstorm threatens to ruin his proposal plans. Baylen and Colin drop one last bombshell on the entire family.

videos.title: Obsessed With Everything
videos.overview: Baylen and Colin are enjoying being fianc√©s but are dragging their feet on wedding planning; Baylen questions Allen about an unresolved issue; a reluctant Baylen makes a cake for Colin's birthday; her parents spring a surprising request on them.

videos.title: The Ticcer
videos.overview: Baylen has an unexpected reaction to the first wedding venue she and Colin tour; Baylen meets with her CBIT therapist to discuss goals for her wedding day; at their first pre-marital counseling session, Colin reveals he's been keeping a secret.

videos.title: Addicted All Around
videos.overview: Colin's surprising admission to Baylen throws a wrench in the wedding vision. Sammi and Burke don't hold back in sharing their opinions with Baylen while Allen concocts a master plan that he hopes Baylen will be on board with for her big day.

videos.title: Anxiety on High Alert
videos.overview: Baylen hosts a sleepover for her brother, Bechnir; Allen and Julie seize the rare chance to have a date night; Bechnir confides in Baylen about his severe anxiety; Allen confronts the painful history behind his fierce protectiveness.

videos.title: It's So Inappropriate!
videos.overview: Baylen's new tic about Colin's mom has her dreading their trip to Roanoke; Colin turns to his sister for advice on his career after the military; Julie and Allen discuss Bechnir's anxiety; Colin invites some surprising guests to a venue tour.

videos.title: She's Gonna Lose Her Mind
videos.overview: During counseling, the therapist throws a wrench in Colin's plan to confront Allen. Baylen and Colin fall in love with a wedding venue, but when they see the Dupree backyard transformed for the engagement party, they second guess everything.

videos.title: Did I Mention That I Have...
videos.overview: At their engagement party, Baylen and Colin finally announce they've chosen the wedding venue of their dreams but it's a decision that leaves both Julie and Allen struggling to find their place in Baylen's wedding plans.

videos.title: Saddle Up!
videos.overview: Baylen and Colin's plan to set boundaries turns upside down when Allen pressures Colin to have a back-up plan for his new real estate career; the couple gets a harsh reality check at their first meeting with their wedding planner.

videos.title: I'm on the Struggle Bus
videos.overview: Baylen and Colin find themselves in an impossible situation with the wedding . Baylen readies herself for wedding dress shopping, but it's bittersweet without Sammie. On their drive to meet Dr. Flaherty, Colin drops a truth bomb on Baylen.

videos.title: Get Me Out of Here!
videos.overview: Baylen grows curious about a device for her tics but would need to leave the country to try it; a trip to the library is anything but uneventful for Baylen; Colin takes the first step in his new career and learns just how hard it can be to succeed.
